name: Chameleon Runner
description:
Use Keys 1, 2, 3, 4, and Space.

Help the Chameleon match the background!  He is very shy and likes to run fast.

Jump over spikes, watch out for white paint, and mix together the 3 primary colors to reach the goal!

This game was created for Mini Jam 62: Colors. The project was directed by James Jacobus, with the help of his friends Matt, David, and Marie.

Music: www.bensound.com

Sound: https://freesound.org/ - (Chilljeremy/8-Bit Victory Sound.wav) (jeckkech/jump.wav) (ProjectsU012/8-bit "failure" sound) (SlykMrByches/Splattt.mp3) (freefire66/Bucket Hit.wav)
